doc: Why in rbac [migrate](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/master/framework/rbac/migrations/m140506_102106_rbac_init.php#L75) field 'user_id' is varchar (64)
if you [migrate](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2-app-advanced/blob/master/console/migrations/m130524_201442_init.php#L17) to yii2-app-advanced field 'id' in table 'user' integer (11)
because of this, between them you can't build a foreign key
